Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- {passiveImg:once}Recovers 59% HP
- Ki +6
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ
excluded) to TEQ Ki Spheres
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK 66%{passiveImg:up_g}
*3 or more TEQ Ki Spheres obtained*
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- Chance of performing a critical hit 6%{passiveImg:up_g} per TEQ Ki Sphere
obtained (count starts from the 4th Ki Sphere)
*For 6 turn(s) from the character's entry turn*
- Damage reduction rate 66%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Starting from the 7th turn from the character's entry turn*
- Damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:up_g} per Ki Sphere obtained (up to
66%)
*As the 1st attacker in a turn*
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn*
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class
characters*
- DEF 66%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 30%{passiveImg:up_g}

6019.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

6020.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
